subject: Hello dear beneficiary

subject: Re:   Hello dear beneficiary
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about this opportunity. Could you please provide me with some additional information? How did I become a winner of the MILLION DOLLARS ATM Card? Is there a specific reason why I was chosen?

Best wishes,
Larry
